Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win7 x64,Win8 x64,Win10 x64,Win11 x64,Win12 x64
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: AdBlocker now merges updates with your custom lists, no more exports needed. Right-click to block instantly. TurboDown 2.0 is faster and smoother. Tabs now move top or bottom. Extension folder fixed. Smarter, faster, and cleaner... your browser perfected!
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size with Windows 7 x64 and Beyond...

English.Char_Desc_45: An extremely fast and secure web browser...
English.Char_Desc_80: An extremely fast and secure web browser that's able to accept v2/v3 extensions.
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite NetSurfer Extreme is an extremely fast and secure web browser that's able to accept extensions. NetSurfer also blocks social media and website tracking from websites that you visit, but individual cookie blocking is also available.
English.Char_Desc_450: SSuite NetSurfer Extreme is an extremely fast and secure browser that's able to accept extensions. It also blocks social media and website tracking from sites that you visit, but individual cookie blocking is also available. This ensures no tracking, information collection, or any other data leaks on your browsing habits from BigTech. We have also added a Private Mode to ensure complete protection against personal data collection and tracking.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The SSuite NetSurfer Extreme browser, is an advanced browser engineered to deliver exceptional speed, convenience, and unparalleled customization through its unique ability to install third-party v2/v3 manifest extensions. Designed for online users who demand flexibility and performance, this browser redefines the browsing experience with its online security, robust capabilities, and intuitive interface.
SSuite NetSurfer Extreme stands out for its lightning-fast performance, ensuring rapid page loads and smooth navigation across the web. Whether you're browsing everyday websites or engaging in resource-intensive tasks, this browser maximizes efficiency without compromising on user experience!
SSuite NetSurfer Extreme is based on Microsoft's WIN32 API.
Quote from Microsoft's website: "...The Win32 API platform is the choice for applications that need the highest compatibility, level of performance and direct access to system hardware..."
SSuite NetSurfer Extreme also comes bundled with PCDrop, a file transfer app for syncing files with your Android phone directly from your PC desktop.
Security and privacy are paramount with SSuite NetSurfer Extreme, featuring robust measures to safeguard user data and protect against online threats. Its original user-friendly design and customizable settings further enhance usability, ensuring a seamless experience for both casual users and power users alike.
By default, NetSurfer is evergreen and receives monthly updates to help you stay on the latest and most secure surfing platform. NetSurfer Extreme is Chromium-based for best performance and security on all Windows systems.
Experience the next evolution in web browsing with SSuite NetSurfer Extreme; where speed, convenience, and extensibility converge to redefine how you interact with the digital world.
Make the world-wide information superhighway work for you!
No Java or DotNet required. Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time...
